name: The Temptation Stack
description: The perfection combination of prime rib and angus beef. Guarantee to make you break your diet. Topped with garden fresh veggies and secret sauce.

name: The Monster Stack
description: The delicious monster of a burger is created with our finest sirloin steak. Do you dare to take on this tower of a burger.
